name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shining Christmas Tree with Snowfall Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brighten your browser with a Shining Christmas Tree and snowfall live wallpaper, featuring shortcuts and a sleek design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: A radiant Christmas tree surrounded by gentle snowfall.
Minimalist Design: Clean, festive interface for smooth browsing.
